meanings.sent1: The unskillful chef burned the dinner.
meanings.sent2: She is unskillful at playing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The unskillful juggler kept dropping the balls.
meanings.sent4: His unskillful attempts at painting left the walls a mess.
meanings.sent5: The unskillful driver caused a fender bender.

meanings.definition: Not possessing or demonstrating skill or expertise.
meanings.sent1: The unskillful student struggled with the math problem.
meanings.sent2: He is unskillful in fixing things around the house.
meanings.sent3: The unskillful dancer tripped over her own feet.
meanings.sent4: Her unskillful handling of the situation only made things worse.
meanings.sent5: The unskillful writer had trouble expressing her ideas clearly.
